title: Silicone Dish Drying Mat - Drain Hole, Non-Slip, Heat Resistant, Foldable. Great for Dishes, Kitchen Sink, Counter Top, Fridge Drawer Liner or Trivet for Hot Pots. (16" X 20" | Grey)
features: SAVES SPACE: Made from high quality, soft silicone material the dish drying mat is pliable and easy to roll-up or fold for convenient storage.
PREMIUM QUALITY: 100% silicone, durable and heat resistant. Non-slip surface protects your dishes and glassware.
CONVENIENT DESIGN: The raised, wavy deep ridges provide ventilation, allowing dishes to dry faster. Drain hole provides for efficient water drainage.
EASY TO CLEAN: The mat can be brushed or rinsed directly with water and gently wiped down, super easy to keep clean.

MULT-PURPOSE: This silicone mat is heat resistant, making it an excellent trivet for hot pots, pans and bakeware, in addition to being a drying mat for kitchenware. Can also be used as a liner for refrigerators or drawers.
description: KEEP COUNTERTOPS DRY Designed with raised ridges in a wide rippled pattern to prevent water from running onto the counter, while providing great ventilation and allowing kitchenware to dry quickly.  SAVES STORAGE SPACE Soft silicone material is flexible and can easily be rolled or folded to conveniently store away when not in use. Convenient for apartments, RVs, campers, boats or anywhere you value your space.  MULTI-FUNCTIONAL In addition to drying kitchenware, this heat resistant mat also makes an excellent trivet for hot pots, pans and bakeware. Can also me used as a heatproof mat for hair styling tools.
